sintom programista stron internetowych

Hello!

Who I am ?

Geek

Front End Technologies enthusiast.

Hi my name is Tom and currently I'm freelancer. For the last few years I have worked for big international companies in HR Depatments, where I‘ve developed excellent soft skills, such as teamwork, communication and cooperation with many different external and internal clients. Yet it was front end that re-ignited my passion for work.

Developer

Responsive website and web apps this is what i build.

I always build modern and resposive website & apps. What I use: HTML, CSS with preprocessor like Sass, JS with framework - currently I spend time with React and Redux. To speed up my work I use gulp and webpack. In future I plan focus on backend too and become a Full Stack Developer.

Hobbyist

I Invest in myself after hours.

Front-End is for my a hobby and opportunity to spend time productively. After some time in front-end technologies I’ve decided to change my life and seek a professional career in this area. I hope you will find my projects interesting, and I’ll be happy to talk about them face to face. Enjoy and never stop coding!
